venue.name: Charles River Canoe and Kayak, Newton Boathouse

item.description:
Hey Everybody,

I train on the Charles River (usually the Newton section) several times each week. I am happy to slow it down to a leisurely paddle as well. If you don't own your own kayak, one can be rented at Charles River Canoe and Kayak.
Additionally, I am happy to teach what I know including basic paddling skills, wet exits, bracing and rolling.

I am in the process of planning a serious white water trip to the Kennebec and Penobscot rivers in Maine. Anyone else interested?

Call me direct, easier that way:
617 803 3003

Paddle Hard, Paddle Safe, Paddle Often

-Steven
item.name: Paddling and Rolling
